changeSet.createProcedure: CREATE FUNCTION cch_get_ancestors(item_id VARCHAR(10)) RETURNS TABLE (id VARCHAR(10)) AS $BODY$ WITH RECURSIVE branch(id, parent) AS ( SELECT a.item_id, a.aggregation_id FROM aggregation_children a WHERE a.item_id=(SELECT item.id FROM item WHERE item.id = $1) UNION ALL SELECT a.item_id, a.aggregation_id FROM aggregation_children a, branch b WHERE a.item_id = b.parent ) SELECT DISTINCT(branch_tbl.parent) FROM (SELECT * FROM branch) AS branch_tbl UNION (SELECT item.id as id FROM item WHERE item.id = $1) $BODY$ LANGUAGE sql;
